title: Medical Simulation-Based Invention and Mastery Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of medical procedures and anatomical structures
context.additional_context: Mobile learning environment using smartphones, with an LMS optimized for medical simulation content

learning_goals: Learners can invent and apply new procedural techniques with over 85% accuracy in a medical simulation environment.
Learners can perform standard medical procedures with an evaluation score of 4.0/5.0 or higher, meeting mastery learning criteria.
Learners can achieve a PFL (Preparedness for Future Learning) score of over 75% after a 2-week delayed assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
